name: The Day Before The Day The Earth Stood Still
name_original: The Day Before The Day The Earth Stood Still
description:
THE DAY BEFORE THE DAY THE EARTH STOOD STILL
--------------------------------------------
 Go down to Earth eviting Zx-81 spaceships, go throw the meteor belt, dodge misiles, boats and planes from the army and descend over Washington.
EL DÍA ANTES AL ULTIMÁTUM A LA TIERRA
-------------------------------------
 Llega hasta la Tierra evitando las naves Zx-81, supera el cinturón de asteroides, esquiva los misiles, barcos y aviones del ejército y aterriza en Washington. 
Keys: OPQ
azimov2019
Music by AsteroideZX
A.G.D. by Jonathan Caldwell
Tested by DenimMSX
